item.description:
Remember the good old days of "Job Security" when you worked for the same company for most of your life and they took care of you when you retired?
http://www.foreclosur...

FACT: The U.S. Department of Labor estimates that people entering the work force will have 10-14 jobs by the age of 38!

How can we expect to keep up? How can we balance our retirement with the lack of job security?

For many of us, the answer is investing in real estate, either on the side along our current job, or in place of the regular 9-5.

But how can you make the transition - or the jump - from a full-time job into the world of real estate?

Join us for an educational info-evening where you'll learn about real estate investing as a career and hear from local investors who made the jump from full-time jobs or small businesses to either part-time or full-time careers in real estate.

http://www.foreclosur...

In addition to open Q&A, we'll also be covering the following:
  • Top 3 reasons people invest in real estate
  • Why your home does NOT count as part of your portfolio
  • How some investors work full time and invest on the side
  • Making the transition from part-time to full-time
  • How to replace your full-time career with investing
  • How much time is needed to invest in real estate
  • Financing options for first-time investors
  • The 7 big "gotchas" that you need to watch out for
  • Resources for further information
  • The "slow and steady" path to wealth in real estate
  • Next steps that you can implement right away

Find out all of this and more at our next info-evening. This event is FREE if you pre-register, but pre-registration is required.
http://www.foreclosur...

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Real Estate Investing Career Night - FREE
